name: Time Hardly Waits
description:
Manipulate time to your will at any moment to solve challenges, avoid deadly traps and make it to the end of this weird and wonderful journey.

Features:

-Bizarre, abstract environments
-Fun, tricky, time-based obstacles
-Engaging Puzzles
-Exploration through strange dimensions
-Off-the-Wall Platforming
-Traps Galore
-Full Controller Support


After a devastating apocalypse that leaves humanity and earth in ruins, you take on the role of a lone soldier on a mission to investigate a mysterious machine that could hold the key to returning humanity to its former glory. However, this mission turns out to be more than meets the eye and you are flung into a dangerous new realm between the bounds of space and time. Now you must make it to the end of this ominous labyrinth, save yourself and ultimately find new hope for humanity.


Time Hardly Waits is an indie abstract adventure filled with mystical environments that will put your abilities to the test and engage you in a world of mystery and wonder.
